intro: Polyalthia lucens, commonly known as the silver flame tree, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its large, showy white flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has compound leaves with numerous small, oval-shaped leaflets.
